responsibilities: Be an integral part of a team responsible for developing and deploying Machine Learning algorithms in the cloud.
Ensure cloud-based ML training and serving platforms are available and performant, and proactively identify problems.
Build tools to improve speed, confidence, and availability of the platform.
Help build security into every step of the software & infrastructure development life cycle.
Collaborate across multiple technical functions to ensure high availability, disaster recovery, and customer satisfaction.
skills: Ability to solve manual & repetitive operations through automation.
Enjoyment of learning new tools, languages, and frameworks.
Ability to work in a highly collaborative environment.
Good communication skills and ability to remain calm under pressure.
High sense of ownership and a “can-do” attitude.
Willingness to dig deep into infrastructure and code to solve problems.
Enthusiastic self-starter with a commitment to learning.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on developing and deploying Machine Learning (ML) algorithms in the cloud, ensuring the performance and availability of cloud-based ML platforms, and building tools to improve the platform's speed and reliability. The responsibilities also include building security into the software and infrastructure development life cycle and collaborating across technical functions for high availability and disaster recovery. The skills required emphasize automation, learning new tools and frameworks, collaboration, organization, customer focus, communication, problem-solving, and a commitment to learning.

There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is more on general ML algorithms, cloud infrastructure, and platform reliability rather than specific applications or technologies related to GenAI or LLMs. While the job involves ML, it does not specifically indicate involvement with GenAI or LLMs.
